job_details.Functieomschrijving: * Enhance user engagement and satisfaction through the integration of advanced AI-driven features into user interfaces
job_details.full_text:
AI-First Front-End Developer, Trilogy (Remote) - $60,000/year USD

* Enhance user engagement and satisfaction through the integration of advanced AI-driven features into user interfaces

profile_classification.rationale: The job description is very brief and focuses on integrating AI features into user interfaces rather than developing core AI models or systems. It lacks specific details on AI tasks, technologies, or responsibilities that would align with ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profiles.

job_tasks.phrase: integration of advanced AI-driven features into user interfaces
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to building and integrating AI capabilities into the front-end of an application, which falls under software development.
This phrase describes a business-oriented goal that the technical work aims to achieve, indicating an understanding of business context and user needs.

soft_skills.justification: The term 'AI-First' suggests a proactive and innovative approach to development, prioritizing AI integration.
